translation.en: [announcer] And it's Rockin' With Dewey continuing to race in second.

translation.de: NETFLIX PRÄSENTIERT Es folgen Masherhal, Hand Over Bell und Perfect Alliance...

translation.en: is still at the back of the field in 56 and 3/5 seconds.
translation.de: EIN NETFLIX ORIGINAL ...liegt mit 56,6 Sekunden nach wie vor am Ende des Feldes.

translation.en: And now MF Happenstance leads the charge around the far turn.
translation.de: Jetzt führt MF Happenstance das Feld um die hintere Kurve.

translation.en: MF Happenstance, three quarters of a length.
translation.de: MF Happenstance hat eine Dreiviertellänge Vorsprung.

translation.en: Mystery Woman second on the outside,
translation.de: Mystery Woman läuft außen auf dem zweiten Platz,

translation.de: Rockin' With Dewey auf der Innenbahn ist Dritter.

translation.en: And they're being followed by Hand Over Bell, Masherhal,
translation.de: Hinter ihnen liegen Hand Over Bell, Masherhal

translation.en: and Perfect Alliance is still at the back.
And they're into the stretch, three quarters in 1:24.2.
translation.de: Bei 1:24,2 haben sie drei Viertel der Strecke hinter sich.

translation.en: And it is still MF Happenstance,
translation.de: Vorne liegt immer noch MF Happenstance,

translation.de: doch jetzt kommt Mystery Woman auf der Außenbahn.

translation.de: -Und in der Mitte Hand Over Bell... -Nein.

[announcer] It is Mystery Woman, Hand Over Bell on the far outside.

then came Rockin' With Dewey
and Mystery Woman in 1:51.4.
I'm starting. No, we wait for him.

[computer] You have a collect call from the Atlantic County Correctional Facility

translation.en: -from... -[recorded voice] Darren.
[computer] Press one to accept.

translation.en: -Where are you? -Jail.
Jesus. What did you do?
No, it's nothing. I've been trying to call you. You didn't pay your fuckin' cell phone?

translation.en: -I'm down in Atlantic City. -Ma.
Just some asshole, I ended up having to smash in his window.

translation.en: so you gotta do it and pretend you're me.
translation.de: Du musst übernehmen und dich für mich ausgeben.

There's $1,500 in it for me. You know I need it.

translation.en: All right? I'll be very proud of you.

What's in the briefcase?
I don't know. No, I'm not doing-- You don't know?

It's nothing major.
I'm not doing that.
-Put Ma on the phone. -No.
-Put Ma on the phone. -[Ola speaking in Polish]

Good. Don't be stupid, I really need this money.

-No. -I'm driving.

my living situation's not great.

We didn't let the dog out.
You know what? Look, I'm going back up there.
translation.de: Weißt du was? Ich gehe zurück.

translation.en: I'm going back up there.
I'm going to explain to them. Take my ID.
translation.de: Ich erkläre es ihnen. Nimm meinen Ausweis.

translation.en: If I get arrested I'm gonna give a false name.
translation.de: Dann kann ich einen falschen Namen angeben.

translation.en: The name isn't the problem, you've been seen by half the family.
translation.de: Der Name ist egal. Die halbe Familie hat dich gesehen.

translation.en: Let's just wait till they go in the morning.
translation.de: Warten wir ab, bis sie morgen gehen. Sie lässt den Koffer sicher da.

translation.en: The wife will probably leave the briefcase inside, we'll go in and get it.
translation.de: Warten wir ab, bis sie morgen gehen. Sie lässt den Koffer sicher da. -Dann holen wir ihn. -Und wenn er nicht da ist?

translation.en: -And what if it's not there? -Then we'll leave, all right?
translation.de: -Dann holen wir ihn. -Und wenn er nicht da ist? Dann hauen wir ab. Wir müssen einfach abwarten.

translation.en: We just got to wait and see.
translation.de: Dann hauen wir ab. Wir müssen einfach abwarten.

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry, all right? I screwed up.
translation.de: Hör mal, es tut mir leid. Ich habe es vermasselt.

translation.en: It's my fault. I'm gonna forfeit my share, okay?
translation.de: Es ist meine Schuld. Du kannst meinen Anteil haben.

translation.en: -But I can't stay here the whole night. -No, you have to.
translation.de: -Aber ich bleibe nicht über Nacht hier. -Das musst du aber.

translation.en: Why? Why? And honestly, you should come with me.
translation.de: Und warum? Du solltest auch mitkommen.

translation.en: We should let them deal with this. This is-- This is their problem. This has nothing to do with us.
translation.de: Sollen die das doch regeln. Das ist ihr Problem, nicht unseres.

translation.en: Unless you know how someone who's broke can make enough money
translation.de: Weißt du, wie ich an genug Geld komme,

translation.en: to get out of a shitty situation, then it's worth it to me.
translation.de: um mich aus einer Scheißlage zu retten? Nein? Dann mache ich es.

translation.en: Are you using the money to get away from that guy?
translation.de: Du brauchst das Geld, um von diesem Typen wegzukommen?

translation.en: Yes, okay?
I'm using the money to leave Pittsburgh.
translation.de: Ich will mit dem Geld weg aus Pittsburgh.

translation.en: good job back there. You know, from not letting the dog out and stuff.
translation.de: Das vorhin hast du gut gemacht. Das mit dem Hund und so.

translation.en: -You gonna order something? -Yeah, sure.
Um, what can we get for nine dollars?
translation.de: Was kriegen wir für neun Dollar?

translation.en: Is that including tip?
Sure.
Can I use your phone?
translation.de: Kann ich mal Ihr Telefon benutzen?

translation.en: -You have reached the voice mailbox of... -Scott.
-Please leave a message after the tone. -[beep]
translation.de: Bitte hinterlassen Sie eine Nachricht nach dem Signalton.

translation.en: Hey, it's me. We're fine, we're on it but we got delayed.
translation.de: He, ich bin's. Wir sind dran, wurden aber aufgehalten.

translation.en: So it won't be going down till tomorrow.
translation.de: Vor morgen wird das also nichts.

translation.en: So, yeah, we'll be at the motel in the morning.
translation.de: Wir kommen dann morgen früh ins Motel.

translation.en: -[Danny] So what'd he say? -Couldn't reach him.
translation.de: -Was hat er gesagt? -War nur die Mailbox.

translation.en: All right, look, let's get some food.
translation.de: Na schön, lass uns etwas essen.

translation.en: You need food? I need food, I'm starving.

translation.en: -Yeah? -All right, yeah.
Kids' menu or appetizers?
[Ellie] So what about you? You got a roommate, girlfriend?

translation.en: [Danny] Well, I was-- I was seeing this girl in my building last year.
translation.de: Was ist mit dir? Hast du einen Mitbewohner? Eine Freundin? Ich war letztes Jahr mit einem Mädchen aus meinem Haus zusammen.

translation.en: [Ellie] Oh, really? With that little hair thing above your lip?

translation.en: All right, who else?
[Danny] I don't wanna talk about this with you. [Ellie] Come on, give me something.

Ma, it could be very bad for me.
translation.de: Mama, das ist auch für mich sehr schlecht.

Some scandalous hallway hookups? Some stairway action?

translation.en: All right.
Rebecca Vargas. She touched my penis in tenth grade.
translation.de: Rebecca Vargas. Sie hat in der Zehnten meinen Penis angefasst.

translation.en: -Wow. Rebecca Vargas? -Yeah, Rebecca Vargas.
Rebecca Vargas back then... Oh, my God, man.
translation.de: Rebecca Vargas war damals einfach... Wow.

translation.en: Ohh. I don't know if it counts, though.
translation.de: Aber ich weiß nicht, ob das gilt.

translation.en: -[Ellie] Why wouldn't it count? -Well...
All right. Mike Budabin, a friend of mine,
translation.de: Mein Freund Mike Budabin sagte allen,

translation.en: he told everyone that whoever got Rebecca Vargas
translation.de: dass der, der Rebecca als Erster dazu bringt,

translation.en: to touch their penis first, wins the "Special Prize."

translation.en: [Ellie] What was the Special Prize?
It was having Rebecca Vargas touch your penis.

translation.en: -Makes sense. -Right.
Anyway, she found out about this prize being associated with her
translation.de: Sie fand irgendwie heraus, dass dieser Preis was mit ihr zu tun hatte

translation.en: and she wanted to know what it was.
translation.de: und wollte wissen, worum es ging.

translation.en: And so she asked me, and I said that I would tell her, but...
translation.de: Sie fragte mich und ich versprach, es ihr zu sagen, aber...

translation.en: she had to touch my penis first.
So she tapped it with her pinky and...
translation.de: Also tippte sie mit ihrem kleinen Finger dagegen und...

translation.en: that's how I won the Special Prize.
[Ola, in Polish] Daniel, just come home now.
You'll make supper, and the bettors are coming early tomorrow.
translation.de: Dann machst du Abendessen und morgen früh kommen die Spieler.

translation.en: We should just let Darren handle it.
Yeah.
I'm gonna stay.
Daniel? Daniel? Hello?
Thank you.
[Ellie] I don't know if that's the sweetest or saddest story I've ever heard in my life.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, ob das das Süßeste oder Traurigste ist, was ich je gehört habe.

translation.en: No, no, no, it's the sweetest. It's the sweetest.
For the record, it counts.
-Really? -Yeah, of course.

translation.en: -What if this is alarmed? -The pool shed?
-I don't know. -Don't worry. It's not alarmed.

translation.en: Just come on. Live a little.

translation.en: So he got off.
So, what do you cook?
Everything.
-I mean, at the restaurant. -Oh. Um...
It's, uh, it's a nice little Italian place.

translation.en: No. No.
I mean, the only place I've ever been is Providence.

translation.en: Well, that's where you should go.
Forget Sacramento.
Yeah.
I've been there once.
-[Danny] You have? -To Italy, yeah.
Wow. Did you go with your family or something?
No.
-I'm sorry, I didn't... -Don't be sorry.
translation.de: -Tut mir leid, ich... -Das muss es nicht.

translation.en: Do you like it there?
Yeah, I guess.
Italy has a lot of shady people once you get past all the tourist stuff.

translation.en: Right.
You don't ever think that maybe it's-- it's not the place that's shady,
translation.de: Manchmal sind es nicht die Orte, die düster sind,

translation.en: it's the people you're choosing to hang out with.
translation.de: sondern die Leute, mit denen man sich umgibt.

translation.en: You know, why don't you go somewhere else besides Providence for the weekend

translation.en: before you start acting like you know everything.

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -No, it's-- No, no, it's okay.
I'm just cold.
You know, if-- if you are cold, we could-- we could hold each other.

translation.en: Excuse me?
You know, we could hold each other for warmth.

translation.en: You wanna cuddle me?
Look, it's a meteorical fact. I'm not, you know.

translation.en: Meteorological.
That's what I meant.
If you try anything, I swear to God you're gonna fuckin' regret it.

translation.en: No, I'm-- I'm a little scared of you, so I'm not...

translation.en: Okay.
Yeah?
We're only cuddling for warmth.

-She said that? -[Scott] Yeah.
Let me hear the message.
I deleted it.

Move on.

Whoa. She's clearly running the family.

[Danny] She was like, I don't know, 30 years younger.

translation.en: -Are you sure? -Yeah.
Shit.
-[Danny] What if she locked it? -You just saw her not lock the door.

translation.en: The whole point of living out here

translation.en: All right, all right.
-Hey! -Take it.
-Hey, is this her? -Yeah, that's her.

- W-E-I-R-E-- - I-R... Wierengo. I got it.

[man] Hello. Annabella Advisors.

Ms. Wierengo. Hi. Yeah. Um...

Polish.
Then I figured out we were-- we were sneaking in at intermission.
translation.de: In der Pause haben wir uns dann reingeschlichen.

translation.en: I don't know, I kind of preferred it that way, though.
translation.de: Keine Ahnung, so war es mir irgendwie lieber.

translation.en: What's wrong?
Nothing.
What?
-Come on, tell me what's up. -I got fired, all right?
translation.de: -Na los, sag schon. -Ich bin gefeuert worden, ok?

translation.en: They called my mom.
Darren just told me. It doesn't matter. I'm sorry.
translation.de: -Darren hat es mir gesagt. Aber egal. -Tut mir leid.

translation.en: I missed my shift, it happens.
translation.de: Ich habe meine Schicht verpennt. Was soll's.

translation.en: It doesn't matter.
Wait. Wait, wait, wait, wait. Listen.
I was thinking that when we get to the motel...
you should just wait nearby.
All right? Let me go up there alone and handle it. I got it.
translation.de: Ok? Ich gehe allein hoch und regle das. Ich schaffe das schon.

translation.en: Look, I'm gonna call my manager, all right?
translation.de: Ich würde gerne meine Chefin anrufen, ok?

translation.en: Okay? I just wanna see what she's saying. I don't wanna...
translation.de: Ich will nur hören, was sie sagt. Ich...

translation.en: Just give me a minute?
Yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah. Sure.
[man] Miss, you got a Metro card?
No. I just gotta get my bag.
translation.de: Nein. Ich will nur meine Tasche holen.

translation.en: -Danny. -Hey, Mom.
You didn't bring the-- You didn't bring the fucking briefcase?
translation.de: Du hast... Du hast den Scheißkoffer nicht dabei?

translation.en: Are you fucking kidding me, Danny? [punching his palm] Are you fucking kidding me?
translation.de: Willst du mich etwa verarschen, Danny? Willst du mich verarschen?

translation.en: -It's fucking funny to you, man? -Yeah.
[Scott] Ellie.
-Hey! I tried to call you. I tried to-- -Yeah, yeah.
Yeah, yeah.
That girl...
She isn't gonna leave anybody.
Even if she thinks she is.
She isn't.
Trust me.
What did you say? Huh?
-What are you saying to me? -Fuck you.
That's what I'm saying.
-Russell, where are we going? -I don't know. To some rich lady.
translation.de: -Wo fahren wir hin, Russell? -Weiß nicht. Zu irgendeiner reichen Tante.

translation.en: Ma! Leave it. Just leave it, okay? Leave it.
translation.de: Mama! Lass es einfach, ok? Lass es!

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. -[speaking in Polish]
Ma.
[woman] Come in.
Come in. You can-- You can put that down.
translation.de: Komm rein. Du kannst das hier abstellen.

translation.en: Right there.
Very good.
Sit.
You wanna know the combination?
translation.de: Weißt du, wie die Kombination lautet?

translation.en: Zero-zero-zero.
It's about the only thing these guys did that wasn't Byzantine in its complexity.
translation.de: Das Einzige, was diese Typen nicht übertrieben kompliziert gemacht haben.

translation.en: [gasps] But you know how some men are.
translation.de: Aber so sind manche Männer eben.

translation.en: They think the more intricate they make something, the more impressive it is.
translation.de: Je komplizierter, desto beeindruckender. Glauben sie jedenfalls.

translation.en: Ah, there you are.
The one thing the lawyer said I couldn't get.
translation.de: Der Anwalt meinte, ich würde es niemals bekommen.

translation.en: And I got it.
[sighs] I want to tell you something:
Never marry a man who doesn't love his mother.
translation.de: Heirate niemals einen Mann, der seine Mutter nicht liebt.

translation.en: There's $3,000 in that envelope.
Thank you.
You can-- You can leave.
And I'll let Jimmy know it's done so everyone else can get paid.
translation.de: Ich gebe Jimmy Bescheid, damit die anderen bezahlt werden.

translation.en: [Russell] So where we going?
Not today. We're not open.
-[knock at door] -We're just-- We're gonna--
[Ola] Who are you?
I'm, uh...
-I'm Rebecca Vargas. -[mother] Rebecca Vargas?
-Yeah? -[mother speaking in Polish]
Yeah, we went to high school together, Ma. You don't remember?
translation.de: Wir waren zusammen auf der Highschool. Weißt du nicht mehr?

translation.en: Don't spend it all at the club.
translation.de: Hau nicht alles auf den Kopf.

translation.en: Take it. And don't give it to your brother.
translation.de: Nimm es. Aber gib es nicht deinem Bruder.

translation.en: So where are you gonna go?
Bus to Pittsburgh.
Yeah?
I thought you said you were gonna leave there.
translation.de: Ich dachte, du wolltest weg von da.

translation.en: I am.
I just...
-I... -[scoffs]
-I owe it to him. -Yeah.
Right.
Just wait.
Just wait.
You know, you know, you don't...
You need a Metro card.
I-- I think I can buy one.
translation.de: Die kann ich mir selbst kaufen.

translation.en: You can't because you only have hundreds
translation.de: Nein, weil du nur Hunderter hast.

translation.en: and those machines are crappy and-- and I wanna give you...
translation.de: Diese Automaten sind scheiße. Ich gebe dir...

translation.en: my Metro card.
Thanks.
...two, three, four, five.
Ma, Ma.
Sir, sir, I'll give you $100-- 100 for your card.
translation.de: Ich gebe Ihnen 100 Dollar für ihre Fahrkarte.

translation.en: Whoa. How do I know that's not counterfeit?
translation.de: Und woher weiß ich, dass es kein Falschgeld ist?

translation.en: It's not.
Give me a swipe, give me a swipe.
translation.de: Ich will nur ein Mal durch.

translation.en: -One swipe. -One swipe.
Thanks.
Hi. When's the next bus to Pittsburgh?
translation.de: Hallo, wann fährt der nächste Bus nach Pittsburgh?

translation.en: Uh... 6:40 p.m. The ticket is $57.
-[woman] Miss? -Yeah, uh-- never mind, actually.
When's the next bus to Providence?
translation.de: Wann fährt der nächste Bus nach Providence?

translation.en: Sorry! Sorry, sorry! Sorry.
I-- I didn't think you...
[panting] Look. Look.
I was gonna go and I-- and I just-- I just ran all the way here.
translation.de: Ich bin den ganzen Weg gerannt.

translation.en: What's going on?
Look...
I want to go to Pittsburgh with you.
translation.de: Ich will mit dir nach Pittsburgh.

translation.en: I'm not going to Pittsburgh.
translation.de: Ich fahre aber nicht nach Pittsburgh.

translation.en: Well, where you going?
Providence.
Yeah?
Can I come with you?
Yeah. Sure.
Yeah?
-Yeah. -Yeah?
Wait.
-I'm sorry, okay? I shouldn't have-- -It's okay.
translation.de: -Es tut mir leid, ok? Ich hätte nicht... -Schon gut.

translation.en: -It's okay. -No, no, I shouldn't have done that. I shouldn't have done that. I'm sorry, I just...
translation.de: Nein, ich hätte das nicht tun sollen. Es tut mir leid, aber ich...

translation.en: -Look, I apologize, okay? -Don't be. Don't-- Don't be sorry.
translation.de: -Entschuldigung, ok? -Nein. Dir muss nichts leid tun.

translation.en: I just didn't...
Oh, shit.
Do you still wanna come?
Yeah.
Yeah, I still wanna come.
Okay, good.
And about the kiss...
it's not that I...
translation.de: Es ist nicht so, dass ich...

translation.en: I just don't...
It's a start.
-Okay? -Yeah.
Yeah. I'll take a start.
Yeah, me too.
